Headline: #121 Union/Streeterville Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lower Wacker/Michigan
ShortDescription: NB 121 Union/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #121 Union/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
